word:
Counsel to a Strong-willed Couple.--Neither husband nor wife is to make a plea for rulership. The Lord 
                                                                           107
has laid down the principle that is to guide in this matter. The husband is to cherish his wife as Christ cherishes the church. And the wife is to respect and love her husband. Both are to cultivate the spirit of kindness, being determined never to grieve or injure the other. . . .
